main event: On 12 September 1947, Pan American pilots observed an unidentified object during a flight from Midway Island to Oahu.
interesting points: The object was first seen approximately one mile off the starboard bow of the plane,The observed light changed from white to reddish hue and exhibited extraordinary speed,The object maintained an altitude between 9,500 to 10,000 feet throughout the observation,The entire sighting lasted approximately six seconds and was thoroughly evaluated by the pilots for possible explanations,No photographs were available, as the report was primarily text-based.
location: Midway Island to Oahu, Hawaii, USA
witness description: Pan American pilots with extensive flying experience
